findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The deployer or operator can mint tokens after initial deployment without any limitations, allowing for an unlimited number of tokens to be minted.

findings.title: Deployer can add/remove burn addresses
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to add or remove burn addresses, which may lead to unauthorized token burning.

findings.title: Deployer can add/remove farm addresses
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to add or remove farm addresses, which may lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the smart contract.

findings.title: Deployer can set treasury address
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set the treasury address.

findings.title: Burn addresses can burn tokens
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to add/remove burn addresses and these burn addresses have the ability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Bank addresses can mint tokens after initial deployment
findings.description: Bank addresses have the capability to mint tokens even after the initial deployment of the smart contract.

findings.title: Farm addresses can mint tokens after initial deployment
findings.description: Farm addresses have the capability to mint tokens even after the initial deployment of the smart contract.

findings.title: Deployer or operator can set swap fee with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer or operator has the ability to set a swap fee without any limitations, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer or operator can collect profit from contract
findings.description: The deployer or operator has the ability to collect profits from the contract, which could lead to potential exploitation.

findings.title: Deployer or operator can burn liquidity pool
findings.description: The deployer or operator has the capability to burn the liquidity pool, which could lead to unintended consequences and potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can set mint fee with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to set a mint fee without any limitations or restrictions, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Deployer can set redeem fee with an indefinite amount
findings.description: The deployer has the capability to set a redeem fee without any limitations, potentially leading to unintended consequences.
